desc.text: Board admins can easily manage the board by making use of the options available in the three-dot menu in the top-right corner. Admins can add members, access the board setting, and view the board statistics.
Filter tasks in a board based on their assignees, priority, status, and tags.
You can view the list of archived tasks and sections. The list of pending and completed tasks in the board can also be viewed.
Get an overall picture of task data across all boards you are an admin of. You can filter specific boards and view reports based on task status, priority and due date.
You can save any board as a template and reuse it later. You can access this option by clicking the three-dot menu in the top-right corner of the board.
You can view tasks in a board based on their status, priority, due date, and assignees.
You can make any member as the admin of this board or you can remove them.

You can create a new task by clicking the "+" icon in the top-right corner of the board. You can also quickly create a new task by clicking the "+" icon that appears when you hover between existing tasks in a section.
Once a board is deleted, all data in it is removed permanently. In case you want to keep the data, you can export this board or archive it.

desc.text: Tasks and users can be imported to the board by uploading a csv file. You can access this option by clicking the three-dot menu in the top-right corner of the board. You can also import tasks and users from Trello.
